item.title: Tangent and an Improv Rig
item.description: The synth used for my Feb 8 show at Dangerous Curve, incorporated in my live electro-acoustic rig. Thereâ€™s a last.fm video of the show that actually has pretty decent sound! What you see below is my homebuilt synth (three square wave oscillators fed through dual 2-pole lowpass filters, each metal box has an engage switch, tone control, and cutoff frequency) fed through (or not) a Boss AW-3 dynamic wah filter, an acoustic guitar contact microphone fed through (or not) an Audiobulb FZ-Bulb, a pocket shortwave radio, several found objects (near and in the tin can), and behind that a Line6 DL4, Electrix Repeater, Alesis Quadraverb and Behringer Xenyx 1622 mixer.
